title: Naanga Podiyan Lyrics Pugazh Song Lyrics

Naanga dhaan da
podian dhaan da
Aattam dhan da
Oorukulla king da

Pondicherry kadal oram
kondadalaam vaada machi vaa
Currency ku panjam illa
collara dhaan thooki vidu da.
Konjam kooda kavala illa
Thuli kooda bayamum illa
Friendsunga kooda ninna
pichidalaam da

Aadi paakalaam da
Adichi thookinaaka
sachin naama da

Naanga dhaan da
podian dhaan da
Aattam dhan da
Oorukulla king da dei

Kaasu irundha Venaa dhaadi da

Namma life one day match da
Indha nimisham pona poye pochu da

vera ponnum venaa da

oru flightum venaam da

oru bottle podhum da

Yaaru vandhaalum summa nikkadhey
Kadavul vandhaalum kadaney ketpome
Yaaru vandhaalum summa nikkadhey
Yemaney vandhaalum yeguri adipome

podian dhaan da
Aattam dhan da
